positive.review:
I use this for VRChat to get playspace drag.
Worth every penny!
An Essential too to maneuver with VR and to workaround certain issues with default VR settings.

I got OVR back when it was free, and I do not regret it at all. I think the utility from this tool is great for moving around and messing with binds, very useful for my setup and would definitely pay the roughly 8 dollar price at time of review if I needed to.
A must have for any VR user. I use this to fly around and go places you normally can’t in VRChat or other games. It even helps fix my floor height. I legit fell in love with this app.

This is MANDATORY for PCVR. My biggest complaint is the price-tag, where it used to be free it now costs money. I understand they would like funding for updates and such, but the last free to use version should have remained free, as it has some of the bare minimum requirements to play vr comfortably. I hope one day they release that specific build for free. VR is expensive enough, please don't contribute to it Steam T-T
Highly recommend to anyone that plays pcvr. The playspace mover is a lifesaver!
i was surprised to find out it costs money now to get it used to be free and i was so confused when my friend said they couldn't get it because it was no longer free
I got this back when it was free and I can say, it's worth buying.
Very useful, I do not regret purchasing this! :D
I used this to get pass fabrications in budget cuts
I can't play any VR games with out OVR, it's so useful
BEST FUCKING THING FOR MOVING PLAYSPACE ITS SO MUCH FUN I HAVE 999 HOURS ON IT
space grab and ling what more do u want
Rip to all the new people who gotta pay for this
Dark souls like 10/10 game play.
Must have for VR power users
snagged it before i used it when it was free
fun
its pretty good idk tho
a must for heavy vr users
easier to didle your frends with :3
Good
Good soup.
is gud
gud
works well
hehe playspace drag go brrr
Approved
i dont even know
yes
necessity
i fly
Yayyy

I received this for free initially.
It's still free on Github.

You don't need to install it from Steam.

Consider this page to be a "donation page" whilst the Github release is for everyday use.
Absolute essential. Such a massive QOL improvement and utility universal to all games that I'm shocked it isnt installed by default into steamvr.
Its good, only regreat is not getting it sooner
Def the best tool for VR games. I mainly use the play space feature to help reposition myself to a proper height

I use this for VRChat to get playspace drag.
Worth every penny!
An Essential too to maneuver with VR and to workaround certain issues with default VR settings.

I got OVR back when it was free, and I do not regret it at all. I think the utility from this tool is great for moving around and messing with binds, very useful for my setup and would definitely pay the roughly 8 dollar price at time of review if I needed to.
A must have for any VR user. I use this to fly around and go places you normally can’t in VRChat or other games. It even helps fix my floor height. I legit fell in love with this app.

BEST THING EVER

for vrchat players and people who use it for going out of bounds in other games

very useful!! if you play vrchat or rec room or anything that needs adjustment to playspace you should definitely buy this!! if your boundary always makes you really tall or short then this is perfect for you!
it can ceartinly help with many difficult to find settings and not to mention it also helped me fix my tracking, 10 out of 10 would recommend

I enjoy the software itself, but it's just extremely annoying in some cases for others, as one of my friends uses space drag in bonelab, and it gives him an extreme advantage in combat because he can just fly around, and in vrchat, if i'm playing a remotely PVP game, my friends can just space drag around and get away, i understand i can do the same but i'm a usually fair person, and pick to not use it. I still think it's a great software, get if you like settings I guess!

Essential for Virtual Reality gaming—especially in VRChat, as it allows you to move your character freely around your play space. It used to be free, but now comes with a price tag; even so, it is still worth it.

This is MANDATORY for PCVR. My biggest complaint is the price-tag, where it used to be free it now costs money. I understand they would like funding for updates and such, but the last free to use version should have remained free, as it has some of the bare minimum requirements to play vr comfortably. I hope one day they release that specific build for free. VR is expensive enough, please don't contribute to it Steam T-T
10/10, necessary piece of  software, would not be the same without it, i have leaped at people while screaming and gotten peak reactions, perfect

Hmm. I guess it's about time to leave a review. This is essential software for VR users. I got it back when it was free, but it's absolutely worth $8. The dev is even so cool as to set the price low, and let you choose a higher price (donation DLC) if you wish. Not to mention how long it was free, and that they gave everyone a heads up that it was going paid. Class act.
Highly recommend to anyone that plays pcvr. The playspace mover is a lifesaver!
i was surprised to find out it costs money now to get it used to be free and i was so confused when my friend said they couldn't get it because it was no longer free
Works most of the time, crashes every so often but it does what I need it to do.
Extremely Useful Tool while in VRchat. So far I have really liked it. Takes a bit to get use to but once you do, it has worked great. Remember to keep it updated but yeah I'm pretty happy with it.
in my opinion this app is a requirement for VR, allows u to do a bunch of stuff, its a shame that its turned into a paid app tho, it was free before
the software is handy if your very lazy and dont want to get up from slouching on a couch and dont wanna get off vr and be a lazy bum. Highly Reccomend!! (seriously this software is very usefull)
Absolute awesome app to have for vr. Made things so much more enjoyable.
I got this back when it was free and I can say, it's worth buying.
I like the control it gives you, amazing to mess around in virtually(:3) any vr game.
One of the most essential apps for VR. Absolutely recommended!
extremely good worth every penny (that is if you're buying it)
Very useful, I do not regret purchasing this! :D

Yaw Reset, Full Reset, Space Drag, Space Drag Reset


Yippee
I use it a little, not to much. so worth 100%
I used this to get pass fabrications in budget cuts
very good and useful for any vr game
good app for vr as you can do anything with it
I can't play any VR games with out OVR, it's so useful
It's really nice and easy to use
BEST FUCKING THING FOR MOVING PLAYSPACE ITS SO MUCH FUN I HAVE 999 HOURS ON IT
space grab and ling what more do u want
Space Drag is the reason why people use this thing
If you are a small creature in vrchat you need to get this!
Rip to all the new people who gotta pay for this
it help a lot whith all the the stuff
10/10 good utility
Dark souls like 10/10 game play.
Must have for VR power users
its like an ok-ish game
snagged it before i used it when it was free
its worth buying it ig
Nice for space drag in VRChat
very nice toolset
An amazing tool for those who use VR
its been seamless for me
funny cheating tool
fun
its pretty good idk tho
very good
good tool for vr
Works Great for VRChat!
If you have thousands of hours shown in this, and nothing else - I know what you are.
good tool
You can fly and stuff :)
good
a necessity for vr
nice
MAKE OVR FREE AGAIN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! GRR
a must for heavy vr users

negative.review:
Was free. Isnt free on steam.
Get it on github ig.
horribel
homosexualism

This product has become almost a requirement when it comes to playing VRChat.
I don't remember playing it without it after getting it.
but when you look at what it allows you to do I only really ever use space drag.
And sometimes make my screen darker, which most worlds in VRChat can do anyway.

There really isn't a reason for you to get this unless you play VRChat.

If you use a VR headset but don't play VRChat there isn't a reason to buy this product.

And that would be a good review if it remained free like it has been for ages.
I am only reviewing it now because of the recent price. 
If it was at this price back when I first got it I don't think I would have spent the money on it.
It's a product you only would every use for VRChat. A game, that is free.
I find the price increase suspicious and It would make me unable to access it back then.

But, if you play VRChat a lot and still don't have this, I do recommend it.
And if you got it for free I recommend donating if you can, maybe it could become free again and allow it to be accessible for all the newer players.

I would have say to get this if it was free still but the price tag is tbh not worth it.   I only use it for the playspace drag and vrchat and tbh when like a product like this was free for a long time just to shift it to a paid product is just shady and I cannot really give a trusting review about this anymore.
Was free, should still be free. nothing changed enough in this program to justify making people pay for it and i find that shady af.

I got this when it was free. After using it as long as I have, I can tell you with full confidence that it's not worth the $12 they ask for it.

I only use 2 of the many settings OVR Advanced Settings adds, and I really cannot think of many other use-cases where I'd be using more of them, in-fact, for most cases I'd be using less of them.

I have no idea why they suddenly decided to make this a paid product. For just a little extra money, you could buy a Zinger Box. That's far more worth the money than this despite being temporary.

Was free. Isnt free on steam.
Get it on github ig.
do not understand it i want to adjust my height
this shit sucl=ks do noy buy
horribel
homosexualism
